create-element-to-jsx.script: const cp = require('child_process'); const path = require('path'); cp.execSync('git clone https://github.com/reactjs/react-codemod.git .', { cwd }); cp.execSync('npm install --ignore-scripts --legacy-peer-deps', { cwd }); cp.spawnSync('node', [path.join(cwd, 'node_modules/jscodeshift/bin/jscodeshift.sh'), '-t', path.join(cwd, 'transforms/create-element-to-jsx.js'), 'src']);

error-boundaries.script: const cp = require('child_process'); const path = require('path'); cp.execSync('git clone https://github.com/reactjs/react-codemod.git .', { cwd }); cp.execSync('npm install --ignore-scripts --legacy-peer-deps', { cwd }); cp.spawnSync('node', [path.join(cwd, 'node_modules/jscodeshift/bin/jscodeshift.sh'), '-t', path.join(cwd, 'transforms/error-boundaries.js'), 'src']);
